actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-602.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3050) to amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to ensure the continued financial integrity of the Rural Electrification and Telephone Revolving Fund, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3050 (rural electrification and telephone financing).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3050) to amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to ensure the continued financial integrity of the Rural Electrification and Telephone Revolving Fund, and for other purposes.
